title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 56-6.3 - Establishment of background level
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 56-6.3 - Establishment of background level

State Regulations

The most elevated air sample result per group of inside
work area or outside work area background air samples comprise the established
background level(s) for that intended regulated abatement work
area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
56-6.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
